briefdescription.para: Calculates the initial number of blocks for the mesh.

detaileddescription.para:
XParam
Model parameters (resolution, block size, etc.)
XForcing
Forcing data (bathymetry, AOI polygon, etc.)
Number of blocks to allocate for the mesh.
This function divides the domain into uniform blocks, checks masking and AOI, and counts blocks that are active for computation.

briefdescription.para: Initializes the mesh and allocates memory for blocks.

detaileddescription.para:
T
Data type (float or double)
XParam
Model parameters
XForcing
Forcing data
XModel
Model structure to hold mesh and block data
Allocates memory, initializes block info, adaptation info, and boundary masks.

briefdescription.para: Initializes block information (active status, level, coordinates, neighbors).
Initializes block adaptation arrays for mesh refinement/coarsening.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Forcing< float > XForcing, BlockP< T > &XBlock)
memberdef.name: InitBlockxoyo

briefdescription.para: Initializes block coordinates and active status for the mesh.

detaileddescription.para:
T
Data type (float or double)
XParam
Model parameters
XForcing
Forcing data
XBlock
Block data structure
Sets block coordinates and marks active blocks based on mask and AOI polygon. Loops over all blocks, checks if each block is inside the area of interest (AOI), and if the mask threshold is met, sets the block as active and stores its coordinates.

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Forcing< float > XForcing, BlockP< float > &XBlock)
memberdef.name: InitBlockxoyo< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (Param XParam, Forcing< float > XForcing, BlockP< double > &XBlockP)
memberdef.name: InitBlockxoyo< double >

briefdescription.para: Initializes neighbor relationships for each block in a uniform mesh.

detaileddescription.para:
T
Data type
XParam
Model parameters
XForcing
Forcing data
XBlock
Block data structure
Sets up neighbor indices for each block (left, right, top, bottom, corners).

briefdescription.para: Calculates the number of blocks with masked neighbors (for boundary handling).

simplesect.para: Number of blocks with masked neighbors.

briefdescription.para: Identifies and stores blocks with masked sides for boundary processing.

detaileddescription.para:
T
Data type
XParam
Model parameters
XBlock
Block data structure
Populates mask arrays for blocks with masked sides for later boundary condition handling.

briefdescription.para: Mesh initialization and management routines for BG_Flood GPU model.

detaileddescription.para: Contains functions for block-based mesh setup, memory allocation, block adaptation, and block neighbor initialization.
